column1: The article deals with a situation on the West Coast of the USA
The main topic of the article is the excessive price of digital art
Cryptocurrencies are “mined“ in places where the internet connection is excellent
Most artists are aware of the environmental damage of NFTs
Creating the NFT has no impact on the environment, it’s only selling or buyng it that has.
This issue is not specific to the art world
International authorities can very easily solve the problem.
Investments made by professional miners make it very hard to change anything
People are hopeful that cryptocurrencies will become greener very soon
